Core Coin is an open source, public Bloc: Core Coin is an open source, public Blockchain application platform featuring one of the most secure smart contract functionality.
The Value Custodian for a Decentralized: The value custodian for a <1>decentralized world</1>
Borderless network anywhere in the World: Borderless network anywhere in the World run on various networks.
Core distributed computing platform is r: Core distributed computing platform is reliable, secure and available for everyone.
Connecting the World using Oracles and d: Connecting the World using Oracles and distributing Financial instruments through Smart Contracts.
Immutable Blockchain transactions are st: Immutable Blockchain transactions are stored in tamper-proof P2P ledgers.
Twisted Edwards curve — Edwards448 — 224: Twisted Edwards curve — Edwards448 — 224-bit //Spinal Tap-grade// security level.
Core Blockchain is using a self-organize: Core Blockchain is using a self-organized system — Boids — to transact and route the data.
Our mission is building a Global Decentr: Our mission is building a Global Decentralized Network (GDN) to cover all areas on the planet using multiple communication technologies along with Core Blockchain platform.<1>We are creating an Inclusion program suited for all people.</1>
A decentralized structure within the who: A decentralized structure within the whole ecosystem allowing voting through the CORE FOUNDATION. We are inviting any new ideas for the Blockchain. Our blockchain has a program called Core Community Fund (CCF) to award projects deemed to be beneficial for the network.
Core Blockchain can operate on various p: Core Blockchain can operate on various platforms and environments - including mesh networks, satellite streams, mobile internet connection and more.
core mining: Get a headstart, start <1>Core Coin mining</1>
We optimize the mining algorithm to be m: We optimize the mining algorithm to be more focused on small devices and connected to mesh network ecosystem. Meshnet is Blockchain topology, connecting nodes and transmit various data into established and new devices.
Copyright © 2018-2021 Core Foundation. A: Copyright © 2018-2021 Core Foundation. All Rights Reserved.
This download consist of all blocks that: This download consist of all blocks that have been verified.
Core Block Explorer is a web tool that p: Core Block Explorer is a web tool that provides detailed information about Core blocks, addresses, and transactions.
The Core Wallet allows you to hold and s: The Core Wallet allows you to hold and secure Core and other crypto-assets built on Core, as well as write, deploy and use Smart Contracts.
Go-core is the the command line interfac: Go-core is the the command line interface for running a full Core node implemented in Go.
By mining, you can earn cryptocurrency w: By mining, you can earn cryptocurrency with your CPU hashing power. CPU-based miners to start dig your Ores.
We are monitoring network and provide th: We are monitoring network and provide the tools to monitor the health and track your transactions
How to get started with Core Mining: How to get started with Core Mining
Contribute to the Core Network with comp: Contribute to the Core Network with computation power of your CPU and recieve rewards in Core Coins
Safe storage for your digital assets: Safe storage for your digital assets
Store your freshly mined assets securely: Store your freshly mined assets securely.
Our Core block index is a web tool that: Our Core block index is a web tool that provides you with detailed information about Core blocks, addresses, transactions and more.
Charts and metrics for the Core network. Explore our Boid locations Worldwide.
Join Core Blockchain ecosystem and enjoy: Join Core Blockchain ecosystem and enjoy all its ts
Join the Borderless network anywhere in: Join the Borderless network anywhere in the World run on various networks.
Core Blockchain translators are always t: Core Blockchain translators are always translating pages in as many languages as possible. To see what they're working on right now or to sign up or to join them.
Interested in translating? Get involved!: Interested in translating? Get involved! We're seeking volunteers to join translation community.
We are serving all people Worldwide, any: We are serving all people Worldwide, any language any nationality. Please, contribute to translations to make this vision a reality.
Once you’ve completed the translation, o: Once you’ve completed the translation, our professional translation service will review (and potentially edit) the content.
If translation progress is below 100%, p: If translation progress is below 100%, please contribute! Don’t see your language listed?
Once the review is complete (i.e. review: Once the review is complete (i.e. review progress is 100%), we will add it to the website.
Find the language you want to translate: Find the language you want to translate and select a document.
You will need to create a Translate acco: You will need to create a Translate account if you don’t already have one.
The following language translations are: The following language translations are in progress
Search for a term or phrase: Search for a term or phrase...
Verify your download by running this scr: Verify your download by running this script
Boid hop reach represents the Lorem Ipsu: Boid hop reach represents the Lorem Ipsum dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. It has been the industry's standard dummy text.
First blockchain based decentralized dig: First blockchain based decentralized digital identity. CorePass represents the foundation of the Core ecosystem, allowing users to access all the Core platforms and aplications quickly and easily with a push of a button.
